page.para: I am Ant, and this is my dear friend Dove.
One day it was ver/y hot. I was ver/y thirst/y.
I de/cid/ed to go to the riv/er and find some wa/ter.
It was a long way to the riv/er. I grew e/ven more thirst/y.
When I ar/rived at the riv/er, I drank and drank. It was de/li/cious!
But then I fell in the wa/ter! I could not get out!
Sud/den/ly Dove ar/rived. She pulled me out of the wa/ter.
Dove put me care/ful/ly on the ground. Thank you Dove!
That is why Dove is my ver/y dear friend.
